US BANK HOLIDAY: June 20, 2022 – USD payments paused
Bitstamp USD payments paused on Monday, June 20, 2022, due to a public holiday in the US.

Due to the upcoming public holiday in the US on Monday, June 20, 2022, Bitstamp’s bank payment clearing system for incoming and outgoing USD payments will be paused.

USD deposits and withdrawals will be processed the next business day – on Tuesday, June 21, 2022.

EUR and GBP deposits and withdrawals will be processed without interruptions.

If you need any help, please contact us at support@bitstamp.net.
USD payments paused on Monday, June 20, 2022 - Bitstamp
Due to the upcoming public holiday in the US on Monday, June 20, 2022, Bitstamp’s incoming and outgoing USD payments will be paused.
